story.title: Family-first fitness, born in Madipakkam.
paragraphs: Adze Fitness Studio began when a handful of trainers turned their garage sessions into a family-style movement. Madipakkam needed a premium gym that felt human — where neighbours become teammates and coaching is rooted in empathy.
We believe transformation is a group effort. Every class, every check-in, every celebration is designed to build confidence, consistency, and character.
Adze is not just a gym. It’s a movement powered by real people showing up for each other.

founderNote.quote: We don’t just train bodies — we train character, confidence, and consistency.
founderNote.author: Kevin Antony
founderNote.title: Head Coach & Co-founder

pillars.title: Movement
pillars.description: Programming that keeps you strong, mobile, and injury-free.

pillars.title: Mindset
pillars.description: Coaching conversations and community rituals that build discipline and joy.

pillars.title: Motivation
pillars.description: High-energy sessions, progress tracking, and events that keep momentum high.
